data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Ted Unkel signals a Colorado throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
In the minute 7, LA Galaxy's Efrain Alvarez gets in a shot on goal at Dignity Health Sports Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
LA Galaxy have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy close to the penalty box.
In the minute 9, Throw-in LA Galaxy.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of Colorado.
Ball goes out of play for a Colorado goal kick.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Can Colorado capitalize from this throw-in deep inside LA Galaxy's half?
In the minute 13, Ted Unkel awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
Throw-in for Colorado in their own half.
Colorado awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 16, Ted Unkel awards the away team a throw-in.
LA Galaxy's Efrain Alvarez gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Colorado defender.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 18, Ted Unkel signals a throw-in for Colorado, close to LA Galaxy's area.
Colorado pushes forward through Kellyn Acosta, whose finish on goal is saved.
Goal kick for LA Galaxy at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In the minute 23, Ted Unkel signals a free kick to Colorado in their own half.
Colorado needs to be cautious. LA Galaxy have an attacking throw-in.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Ted Unkel.
In the minute 24, Throw-in high up the field for LA Galaxy in Carson.
LA Galaxy's Efrain Alvarez breaks free at Dignity Health Sports Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Carson.
In the minute 26, Can Colorado capitalize from this throw-in deep inside LA Galaxy's half?
Colorado advance rapidly upfield but Ted Unkel blows for offside.
Throw-in for Colorado close to the penalty box.
In the minute 30, Colorado have been awarded a corner by Ted Unkel.
Colorado attack but Keegan Rosenberry's header doesn't find the target.
LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Ted Unkel awards Colorado a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Cole Bassett (Colorado) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 33, Colorado have a dangerous throw-in.
Colorado's Younes Namli gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
In the minute 35, LA Galaxy to take a throw-in in Colorado territory.
Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
In the minute 38, Goal kick for Colorado at Dignity Health Sports Park.
Colorado take a 0-1 lead thanks to Cole Bassett.
That's a fine assist from Sam Vines.
In the minute 42, Joe Corona gets his shot on target but fails to score for LA Galaxy.
LA Galaxy drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in high up the field for LA Galaxy in Carson.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for LA Galaxy at Dignity Health Sports Park.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Colorado.
LA Galaxy needs to be cautious. Colorado have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick LA Galaxy.
In the minute 50, LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Ted Unkel.
In Carson, Cole Bassett of Colorado is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In Carson Colorado attack through Cole Bassett. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Carson.
In the minute 54, Ball safe as LA Galaxy is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, Jonathan Dos Santos is on a sub for Perry Kitchen for LA Galaxy.
Guillermo Schelotto (LA Galaxy) is making a first substitution, with Chicharito replacing Ethan Zubak.
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to Colorado in their own half.
LA Galaxy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 58, The away team replace Danny Wilson with Auston Trusty.
Colorado make their second substitution with Braian Galvan replacing Younes Namli.
Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 61, In Carson a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ted Unkel awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Colorado in the half of LA Galaxy.
In the minute 63, At Dignity Health Sports Park, Nick DePuy has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Ted Unkel signals a throw-in for Colorado, close to LA Galaxy's area.
Jonathan Lewis (Colorado) shoots â€“ and rattles the crossbar!
In the minute 65, Colorado drives forward and Jonathan Lewis gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
At Dignity Health Sports Park, Colorado are penalized for being offside.
LA Galaxy's Cristian Pavon misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 69, It's a goal kick for the away team in Carson.
Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 71, Sebastian Lletget (LA Galaxy) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ted Unkel awards Colorado a goal kick.
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to Colorado.
In the minute 72, Julian Araujo for LA Galaxy has been booked by Ted Unkel and receives a first yellow card.
The home team have replaced Efrain Alvarez with Emil Cuello. This is the third substitution made today by Guillermo Schelotto.
Throw-in Colorado.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
In the minute 75, Julian Araujo (LA Galaxy) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
In the minute 77, LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Jonathan Lewis extends Colorado's lead to 0-2.
Great play from Braian Galvan to set up the goal.
In the minute 81, Giancarlo Gonzalez is replacing Joe Corona for the home team.
Robin Fraser is making the team's fourth substitution at Dignity Health Sports Park with Nicolas Benezet replacing Jonathan Lewis.
Throw-in for Colorado at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In the minute 82, So close for Colorado as Kellyn Acosta's shot comes back off the post.
Colorado are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Nicolas Mezquida is replacing Andre Shinyashiki for Colorado at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In the minute 84, Ball safe as Colorado is awarded a throw-in in their half.
LA Galaxy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Colorado are pushing forward but Kellyn Acosta's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for LA Galaxy at Dignity Health Sports Park.
LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Colorado.
In the minute 89, LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in high up the field for Colorado in Carson.
LA Galaxy needs to be cautious. Colorado have an attacking throw-in.
Keegan Rosenberry of Colorado gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for LA Galaxy at Dignity Health Sports Park.
Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
That's full-time at Dignity Health Sports Park. The final score is 0-2.
